name: Intoxicated Driver
description:
Drink and drive the safe way, behind a computer with your friends. Compete against your friends in various drinking and driving related party game modes!

Game modes:
-One player is a cop, and the rest are drunks. The cop is trying to catch everyone before the time ends, while the drunks are competing to drink as much as possible.
-A free for all game mode where everyone is trying to dodge bombs falling from the sky. Players try to drink as much as possible to increase their score, while simultaneously dodging the bombs.
-A free for all game mode where every player has a trail that kills other players. Try to kill as many of your friends as possible, while also collecting all of the alcohol around the map!
-A racing mode where everyone tries to complete the course as quickly as possible. The further you progress in the course, the more drunk you get!
-And more to come!

Features:
-Multiplayer with as many friends as you like
-In game settings to change style of play
-Multiple different maps
-In depth car customization
-And much more!
